pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A comprehensive online account management system for the COSMIC desktop environment.
The package includes: - Core library for account, provider, and credential management - D-Bus daemon service for OAuth2 authentication and credential storage - GUI application for managing online accounts in COSMIC - Provider configuration system for various services

use.flag: When compiling in release or debug mode, only add line-tables, not full debug info.
Compile in release-maximum-optimization injected profile (codegen-units=1). Still compatible with debug-line-tables-only.
